analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The how it works page failed the test. Investigate the cause and address it immediately to ensure optimal user experience.
insights: The pricing page has the shortest load time, suggesting that its design and content may be simpler than other pages. Use this as a benchmark for optimizing the other pages.
Although TTFB is low, load times can still be improved by optimizing content and reducing the number of requests.
Implementing a Content Delivery Network (CDN) may help reduce load times by serving content from a server closer to the user.
